fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- The King: Your role is Revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your True role, will show up as "King" as well. You start with 6 HP and your Hand Size is 6. You cannot participate in Duels. 
- Outsider: You will learn all Outsider roles that are present at the start of the game. You are able to win with all Outsider roles + the Advisor. Outsider roles specifically requiring the King to die, such as Conqueror, will not appear. **You have some different abilities than the Order King.**

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guards: Play Block! on an attack directed at you of your choice. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Doctors: Play a Heal! OR play a Cleanse! on yourself. [4 uses, 1 CD] 
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using more than 1 card next phase (including (Reforged) cards played upon them). [1 use, Unique]
- Retreat: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters the following Night phase. [1 use, Unique] 
- Facade: Disguise as the Order King this phase. Affects up to Susceptible checks. [3 uses]
- Sense Intent: Learn if a chosen player wins with you or not (True). If they do, you may choose to create a Whisper channel with them without using up a channel. [2 uses, Unique]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only Outsiders (+Advisor if applicable) have won at the end of the game.
